getVersion

public static java.lang.String getVersion()
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          VersionFormatException
Returns the version of this GOAL by checking the local file VERSION.

Returns:
the version of this GOAL
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error in reading the file VERSION
VersionFormatException - if the version read is not formatted well

getLatestVersion

public static java.lang.String getLatestVersion()
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                VersionFormatException
Returns the latest version of GOAL available on the GOAL website.

Returns:
the latest version of GOAL available on the GOAL website
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error in reading the latest version on the GOAL website
VersionFormatException - if the version read is not formatted well
